text: The Slovenian People's Party (hungarian: Szlovén Néppárt slovenian: Slovenska Lüdska Stranka), was a regional Slovene ethnic political party in Hungary. It was founded by Ferenc Ivanóczy in 1895. The party's goals included securing autonomy for the Slovenes in Hungary within the Austro-Hungarian Empire. In 1941, the Hungarian Government banned the party. Category:Defunct political parties in Hungary
title: Slovenian People's Party (Hungary)
